<enumParam name="regulated_dir" prompt="Direction" multiPick="false"
Select ...
Select one or more organisms.
Select one or more organisms.
Select one or more organisms.
Select an organism.
Select one or more organisms.
Select a clone library.
<enumParam name="best_alignment_only" prompt="Best alignments only" multiPick="false"
Select yes to return only those EST alignments that are the best alignment for the EST. Many of the ESTs align at multiple positions in the genome. Selecting yes will consider only those alignments that are the best for each EST
<enumParam name="high_confidence_only" prompt="Consistent alignments only" multiPick="false"
Select yes to return only those EST alignments that are consistent. We define define consistent as having >= 95% identity (the majority have >= 99%) and aligning the EST sequence in a manner that is consistent with a gene model. Ie, there can be gaps (representing introns) in the target genomic sequence but not in the EST query.
<enumParam name="inNotIn" prompt="EST" multiPick="false" help=""
Select yes to return only those EST alignments that are consistent. We define define consistent as having >= 95% identity (the majority have >= 99%) and aligning the EST sequence in a manner that is consistent with a gene model. Ie, there can be gaps (representing introns) in the target genomic sequence but not in the EST query.
<enumParam name="whole_words" prompt="Match only whole words?" multiPick="false"
Select whether to reject text matches that start or end in the middle of a word
Select a gene type.
<enumParam name="includePseudogenes" prompt="Include Pseudogenes" multiPick="false"
Choose whether to include pseudogenes in your query results.
<enumParam name="bait_or_prey" prompt="Specified protein is bait or prey" multiPick="false"
Optionally specifiy whether given protein is bait or prey
<enumParam name="BlastQueryType" prompt="Query sequence type" multiPick="false"
The type of the query sequence (eg. DNA, protein)
<enumParam name="BlastDatabaseType" prompt="Target" multiPick="false"
The type of the target database (eg CDS, translated CDS, Protein)
<enumParam name="BlastDatabaseOrganism" prompt="Organism" multiPick="false"
Organism(s) from which the sequences in the BLAST database originated
<enumParam name="-filter" id="-filter" prompt="Low complexity filter" <suggest default="yes"/
Set the low complexity filter. WUBLAST's default behavior is not to use this filter. NCBIBLAST's is to use it. When filter is set to 'yes' WUBLAST uses seg; NCBIBLAST uses dust for blastn, seg otherwise.
<enumParam name="chromosome" prompt="Chromosome" multiPick="true" help=""
Find genes containing a density of coding snps > this parameter. Density is expressed in number of snps / KB of coding sequence
<enumParam name="chromosome_single" prompt="Chromosome" multiPick="false"
Pick a P. falciparum chromosome
Choose a reference from the list of strains. Strains below the ---------- were sequenced at low or specific coverage
Choose a comparator from the list to compare to your reference. Strains below the ---------- were sequenced at low or specific coverage
<enumParam name="snp_strain_m" prompt="Comparator(s)" multiPick="true"
Choose a comparator(s) from the list to compare to your reference. Strains below the ---------- were sequenced at low or specific coverage
<enumParam name="include_reichenowi" prompt="Include P. reichenowi" multiPick="false"
Click yes to include P. reichenowi snps in this query. P.r snps were generated by alignment of P. reichenowi sequence with the P falciparum 3D7 reference sequence. Note, if you want to only query reichenowi, you must click 'None' in the P. falciparum strains select list.
<enumParam name="include_only_queries" prompt="Restrict to queries only" multiPick="false"
Click yes to to restrict the results returned to only those genes which have been input as query ids. This allows you to determine the relatedness of your query set
<enumParam name="snp_stat" prompt="SNP Class" multiPick="false"
Choose the class of SNP you want to query on ... choose minumum and maximum numbers below
<enumParam name="snp_order" prompt="Sort by" multiPick="false"
Results will be sorted on this column in descending order
<enumParam name="sort_order" prompt="Sort direction" multiPick="false"
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="profileSet" prompt="Microarray time course(s) to query" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="waters_profilesets" prompt="Microarray time course(s) to query" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="minOrMax" prompt="Query based on" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="maxExprHour" prompt="Timing of maximal expression" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="maxPlusMinusHours" prompt="Maximal expression time plus or minus" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="minExprHour" prompt="Timing of minimum expression" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="minPlusMinusHours" prompt="Minimum expression time plus or minus" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="inductionFold" prompt="Induction ratio cut-off" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="expressionPct" prompt="Maximum percentile cut-off" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="pfGenomicSequence" prompt="Genomic Sequence" multiPick="false" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="pfNonnuclearSequence" prompt="Genomic Sequence" multiPick="true" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="pfGenomicSequenceMultipick" prompt="Genomic Sequence" multiPick="true" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
<enumParam name="pfGenomicSequenceOrNot" prompt="P. falciparum Genomic Sequence" multiPick="false" default="choose one" help=""
Results will be sorted ascending or descending order
Upper bound on expression percentile.
Upper bound on expression percentile.
<enumParam name="synchronization" prompt="Synchronization" multiPick="false" help=""
Upper bound on expression percentile.
<enumParam name="localization" prompt="Localization" multiPick="false" help=""
Upper bound on expression percentile.
<enumParam name="phyletic_indent_map" visible="false"
This will be generated by clicking the species tree nodes.
<enumParam name="phyletic_term_map" visible="false"
This will be generated by clicking the species tree nodes.
This will be generated by clicking the species tree nodes.
Choose a reagent type
<enumParam name="Dataset" prompt="Organism" multiPick="true"
Choose one or more organisms to search with the given motif
<enumParam name="asexual_blood_stages_value" prompt="Asexual blood stages"
mininum requirement of score by ExportPred algorithm
<enumParam name="gametocytes_value" prompt="Gametocytes"
mininum requirement of score by ExportPred algorithm
<enumParam name="ookinetes_value" prompt="Ookinetes"
mininum requirement of score by ExportPred algorithm
<enumParam name="oocysts_value" prompt="Oocysts"
mininum requirement of score by ExportPred algorithm
<enumParam name="sporozoites_value" prompt="Sporozoites"
mininum requirement of score by ExportPred algorithm
<enumParam name="mass_spec_stage" prompt="Lifecycle Stage" multiPick="false"
Select a lifecycle stage from the list provided.
<enumParam name="start_from" prompt="Start Location" multiPick="false"
Select whether to measure the start point from the beginning or end of the sequence
<enumParam name="end_from" prompt="From" multiPick="false"
Select whether to measure the end point from the beginning or end of the sequence
<enumParam name="protein_dataset" prompt="Protein Dataset" multiPick="true" help=""
Select whether to measure the end point from the beginning or end of the sequence
Select one or more clades.
<enumParam name="ProfileDistanceMethod" prompt="Distance Method" multiPick="false"
The method used to calculate the similarity distance
<enumParam name="ProfileSearchGoal" prompt="Search Goal" multiPick="false"
The searching goal of the profile similarity query
<enumParam name="ProfileProfileSet" prompt="Strain" multiPick="false"
Choose the strain of the profile to search against
<enumParam name="ProfileTimeShift" prompt="Time Shift" multiPick="false"
Whether to allow time shifting or not
<enumParam name="ProfileScaleData" prompt="Scale Result" multiPick="false"
Whether to scale result data into [0..1] or not
<enumParam name="ProfileMinShift" prompt="Min Shift" multiPick="false"
The minimum allowed time shift
<enumParam name="ProfileMaxShift" prompt="Max Shift" multiPick="false"
The maximum allowed time shift
<enumParam name="case_independent" prompt="Ignore capitalization?" multiPick="false"
Use this parameter to control whether to include text that matches except for capitalization (e.g. treat 'DNA', 'Dna', and 'dna' as all equal).
<enumParam name="datasets" prompt="Fields" multiPick="true"
Choose which text fields to search.
Choose one of the constituent databases of InterPro.
Choose one or more strain/day combination

sqlQuery.name: OrganismWithGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT orgs.term, (select apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(trim(to_char(taxon_id))) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') as internal FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY prior taxon_id = parent_id START WITH taxon_id = orgs.internal_tax) as internal FROM (SELECT tn.name AS term, t.taxon_id AS internal_tax FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id in (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ens.taxon_id FROM dots.ExternalNaSequence ens, dots.GeneFeature gf WHERE gf.na_sequence_id = ens.na_sequence_id))) orgs, (SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS term, 1 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS term, 2 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS term, 3 as rank from dual) partial_order WHERE orgs.term = partial_order.term(+) ORDER BY partial_order.rank

sqlQuery.name: OrganismWithSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT orgs.term, orgs.internal FROM (SELECT tn.name AS term, t.taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id in (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ens.taxon_id FROM dots.ExternalNaSequence ens))) orgs, (SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS term, 1 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS term, 2 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS term, 3 as rank from dual) partial_order WHERE orgs.term = partial_order.term(+) ORDER BY partial_order.rank

sqlQuery.name: OrganismWithEsts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT orgs.term, orgs.internal FROM (SELECT tn.name AS term, t.taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id in (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ens.taxon_id FROM dots.ExternalNaSequence ens, dots.Est e WHERE e.na_sequence_id = ens.na_sequence_id))) orgs, (SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS term, 1 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS term, 2 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS term, 3 as rank from dual) partial_order WHERE orgs.term = partial_order.term(+) ORDER BY partial_order.rank

sqlQuery.name: SpeciesName
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT orgs.term, orgs.internal FROM (SELECT tn.name AS term, tn.name AS internal FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id in (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT ens.taxon_id FROM dots.ExternalNaSequence ens, dots.GeneFeature gf WHERE gf.na_sequence_id = ens.na_sequence_id))) orgs, (SELECT 'Plasmodium falciparum' AS term, 1 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium vivax' AS term, 2 as rank from dual UNION SELECT 'Plasmodium yoelii' AS term, 3 as rank from dual) partial_order WHERE orgs.term = partial_order.term(+) ORDER BY partial_order.rank

sqlQuery.name: PfOrganism
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tn.name AS term, t.taxon_id AS internal, rownum AS idx FROM sres.TaxonName tn, sres.taxon t WHERE tn.name_class='scientific name' AND t.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND t.rank = 'species' AND t.taxon_id in (SELECT taxon_id FROM sres.taxon CONNECT BY taxon_id = prior parent_id START WITH taxon_id IN (SELECT taxon_id FROM dots.ExternalNaSequence)) AND tn.name LIKE '%falciparum%'

sqlQuery.name: GeneTypes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(term_name, 'non_protein_coding', 'misc RNA'), '_encoding', ''), '_', ' ') AS term, sequence_ontology_id AS internal FROM sres.SequenceOntology WHERE term_name IN ('protein_coding', 'rRNA_encoding', 'snRNA_encoding', 'tRNA_encoding', 'non_protein_coding')

sqlQuery.name: EstLibraries
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT REPLACE(dbest_name, ',', ' - ') AS term, library_id AS internal FROM dots.library ORDER BY dbest_name

sqlQuery.name: SnpStrainA
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct strain_a as internal, CASE WHEN strain_a = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_a END as term, 1 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_a in ('3D7', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10') union select distinct strain_b as internal, CASE WHEN strain_b = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_b END as term, 1 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_b in ('3D7', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10') union select distinct strain_a as internal, CASE WHEN strain_a = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_a END as term, 3 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_a not in ('3D7', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10', 'Preich') and strain_a not like '%-NIH' union select distinct strain_b as internal, CASE WHEN strain_b = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_b END as term, 3 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_b not in ('3D7', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10', 'Preich') and strain_b not like '%-NIH' union select 'foobar' as internal, '-----------' as term, 2 as ord from dual order by ord,internal

sqlQuery.name: SnpStrainB
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct strain_a as internal, CASE WHEN strain_a = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_a END as term, 1 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_a in ('Preich', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10') union select distinct strain_b as internal, CASE WHEN strain_b = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_b END as term, 1 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_b in ('Preich', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10') union select distinct strain_a as internal, CASE WHEN strain_a = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_a END as term, 3 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_a not in ('3D7', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10', 'Preich') and strain_a not like '%-NIH' union select distinct strain_b as internal, CASE WHEN strain_b = 'Preich' THEN 'P. reichenowi (vs. 3D7 only)' ELSE 'Pf-' || strain_b END as term, 3 as ord from apidb.snpsummary where strain_b not in ('3D7', 'DD2', 'GHANA1', 'HB3', 'IT', '7G8', 'D10', 'Preich') and strain_b not like '%-NIH' union select 'foobar' as internal, '-----------' as term, 2 as ord from dual order by ord,internal

sqlQuery.name: ExtraerythrocyticStages
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name AS term, element_order AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name IN ('Sporozoite', 'Gametocyte') UNION SELECT 'Either' AS term, 0 as internal FROM dual ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: IntraerythrocyticStages
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name AS term, element_order AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name IN ('Early Ring', 'Late Ring', 'Early Schizogony', 'Late Schizogony', 'Early Trophozoite', 'Late Trophozoite', 'Merozoite') UNION SELECT 'Any' AS term, 0 as internal FROM dual ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: MetabolicPathways
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, TRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(decode(dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier, null, dr.primary_identifier, dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier),'"',''), CHR(191),'')) AS term FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = 'Links to Pathway Maps' AND dr.primary_identifier != 'qualityControl' ORDER BY term

sqlQuery.name: Mr4Reagents
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT term, internal FROM (SELECT reagent_type AS term, reagent_type AS internal, rownum AS ord FROM (SELECT DISTINCT lower(dr.secondary_identifier) AS reagent_type FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = 'MR4DBxRefs' ORDER BY lower(dr.secondary_identifier)) UNION SELECT 'any' AS term, 'any' AS internal, 0 AS ord FROM dual) ORDER BY ord

sqlQuery.name: Clades
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tn.name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname tn WHERE tn.name IN ('Archaea', 'Eukaryota', 'Apicomplexa', 'Chordata', 'Bacteria')

sqlQuery.name: DomainDatabase
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ed.name AS term, edr.external_database_release_id AS internal FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND dr.db_ref_id IN (SELECT draf.db_ref_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature draf, core.AlgorithmInvocation ainv, core.AlgorithmImplementation aimp WHERE df.aa_feature_id = draf.aa_feature_id AND df.row_alg_invocation_id = ainv.algorithm_invocation_id AND ainv.algorithm_implementation_id = aimp.algorithm_implementation_id AND aimp.executable = 'ApiCommonData::Load::Plugin::InsertInterproscanResults') UNION SELECT ' Choose one:' AS term, -1 AS internal FROM dual ORDER BY term

sqlQuery.name: DayAndStrain
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.profile_element_name_id AS internal, DECODE(ps.name, 'winzeler_NF54_pct', 'Strain NF54', 'winzeler_3D7_pct', 'Strain 3D7', 'winzeler_3D7_MACpct', 'Strain 3D7 (MACS-purified)', ps.name) || REPLACE(pen.name, 'Day', ' Day ') AS term FROM apidb.profileSet ps, apidb.profileElementName pen WHERE ps.name IN ('winzeler_3D7_MACpct', 'winzeler_3D7_pct','winzeler_NF54_pct') AND ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id ORDER BY ps.name, pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: cowmanSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct lg.name AS term, lg.logical_group_id AS internal FROM STUDY.Study s, RAD.StudyAssay sa, RAD.AssayAnalysis aa, RAD.analysis a, RAD.Protocol p, RAD.AnalysisInput ai, RAD.LogicalGroup lg WHERE s.name in ('Molecular mechanism for switching of P.falciparum invasion pathways into human erythrocytes', 'P.falciparum strain 3D7, SIR2 knockout', 'Invasion by P. falciparum merozoites suggests a hierarchy of molecular interactions') AND p.name = 'R Expression Statistics' AND sa.study_id = s.study_id AND aa.assay_id = sa.assay_id AND a.analysis_id = aa.analysis_id AND a.protocol_id = p.protocol_id AND ai.analysis_id = a.analysis_id AND lg.logical_group_id = ai.logical_group_id
